house_listing.house_description: Two story townhouse, with attached garage. Large master bedroom with 3 big closets: sky light and firelace in living room. Sellers are very motivated. Seller is licensed real estate agent: call listig agentveronica santa cruz at (213) 398-6344. Bring all offers !!!
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker 1St Class Rlty Coldwell Banker 1St Class Rlty
